name: Dream Planet
description:
A girl named Makoto falls asleep and finds herself in a dream world that she has to escape from.  This game allows you to explore several different locations to try and find 3 items that you'll need to find for the ending.

This game was made for the Dream Jam. (MMXX).

Plugin Creators:

Yanfly

Atelier Irina

I used the m5x7 font made by Daniel Linssen. And special thanks to my brother for playtesting my game
